articles.author: Live Hindustan
articles.title: 5 Foods To Prevent Anaemia - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Anaemia is caused by iron deficiency when haemoglobin levels are low. Here are some foods you must add to your diet to prevent anaemia
articles.content: Non-veg foods like eggs, lamb, oyster, fish, chicken, etc are packed with protein and iron that help treat anaemia. They also help in easy absorption of vital nutrients
